game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, humanity is on the brink of collapse. The last remnants of civilization cling to life in sprawling metropolises, while the wilderness beyond is a harsh and unforgiving place.
game.ending: After defeating the dark sorcerer, Azrael, and restoring magic to the world, the protagonist becomes a legendary hero. However, as time passes, it becomes clear that Azrael's defeat has come at a terrible cost, and the world must adapt to its newfound power once more.
game.synopsis: In "Echoes of Eternity," players take on the role of an orphan who discovers they are the last living heir of a ancient bloodline. Guided by a mysterious mentor, they embark on a perilous journey across the ruins of civilization in search of a way to restore magic to the world. Along the way, they must navigate treacherous landscapes, battle fearsome enemies, and confront their own destiny.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
